terms_of_use_title: Terms of Use for Dog Adoption Application
unauth_subheading: User must be logged in or registered to add a dog, add to wish list, or adopt.
terms_of_use:
1. General
This application (hereinafter 'Application') is owned by [Your App/Company Name] (hereinafter 'We' or 'Our'). By using this Application, you agree to all terms stated in this document. If you do not agree with these terms, do not use Application.
2. Definition of User
A user is any person who uses Application. Users can be divided into:
• Associations/Shelters: Users representing associations or shelters for abandoned dogs.
• Adopters: Individuals seeking a dog for adoption.
3. Prohibition of Sale and Sale Advertisements
• Strict Prohibition: It is strictly forbidden to use Application for any form of sale, resale, or advertisement for sale of dogs, cats, or any other animal.
• Breeding Advertisements: Advertising breeding of dogs or other animals is prohibited.
• Penalties: Violation of this condition will result in immediate account ban and possible legal action.
• Use of Application: The Application is intended solely for connecting abandoned dogs with potential adopters and providing information about associations/shelters.
4. Use of Application
• Timely Information Updates: Associations/Shelters are responsible for keeping dog profiles up to date.
• Communication Rules: Using Application for any form of inappropriate behavior, insults, or spamming is prohibited.
• Privacy: We are committed to protecting user privacy in accordance with our privacy policy (link to privacy policy).
• Copyright: All content on Application is protected by copyright. Unauthorized use is prohibited.
5. Liability
• No Guarantees: We do not guarantee success of adoption or any other outcome.
• Limited Liability: We are not responsible for any damages or losses resulting from use of Application.
• User Responsibility: Users are responsible for their actions and decisions.
6. Changes to Terms of Use
• We reserve right to change these terms of use at any time.
• Users are responsible for regularly checking updated terms of use.
• Continued use of Application after changes means acceptance of new terms.
7. Legal Jurisdiction
These terms of use are subject to laws of [Your country/state].

about.p1: The dog adoption app is a key to finding
about.p2: By adopting a dog you will give them a second chance and bring joy and love into your life.
about.p3: Wishing you lots of happiness with your new friend
